SimpleLexicon Simple default implementation of a lexicon, which scores word, tag pairs with P(word|tag) instead of dealing with words as strings we will map them to integers with a wordIndexer.
SophisticatedLexicon Simple default implementation of a lexicon, which scores word, tag pairs with a smoothed estimate of P(tag|word)/P(tag).
SpanPredictor
